A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi\, in my opinion\, was a masterpiece of Star Wars lore. It was a beautiful coming of age moment for our new Star Wars sequels and artfully passed along the legacy from the classic legends to our new heroes. Every moment of the movie was the definition of \"Star Wars\" to me\, and I am left anxiously awaiting the next installment.
